Property controller that evaulates formulas to drive the output value. DzFormulaController maintains lists of formulas that are evaluated to set the. More...

Detailed Description

Property controller that evaulates formulas to drive the output value. DzFormulaController maintains lists of formulas that are evaluated to set the.
